cause.description:
Our mission is to help the families of Miguel Aleman rise from poverty. After a summer mission in this small Mexican community, the volunteers were shocked to see the living standards and poverty just south of our border. We have created the organizatoin of MAKE A difference to help these struggling people and help them and their children to see a brighter future.
1. Families must have proper shelter
2. Necessary clothing, food, and essentials must be available
3. Children must recieve proper tools for education
cause.mission: help the impoverished families of Miguel Aleman
cause.name: MAKE A Difference
